modelDescription: Upcoming returns information concerning market holidays and their open/close times.

endpoints.description: Upcoming gets market holidays and their open/close times.

modelFields.description: Close is the market close time on the holiday (if it's not closed).
Date is the date of the holiday.
Exchange is market the record is for.
Name is the name of the holiday.
Open is the market open time on the holiday (if it's not closed).
Status is the status of the market on the holiday.
